QGIS algorithm v.generalize

Source: R/grass7_v_generalize.R
grass7_v_generalize.Rd

QGIS Algorithm provided by GRASS v.generalize (grass7:v.generalize)

grass7_v_generalize(
  input = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  type = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  cats = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  where = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  method = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  threshold = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  look_ahead = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  reduction = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  slide = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  angle_thresh = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  degree_thresh = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  closeness_thresh = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  betweeness_thresh = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  alpha = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  beta = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  iterations = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  .t = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  .l = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  output = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  error = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  GRASS_REGION_PARAMETER = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  GRASS_SNAP_TOLERANCE_PARAMETER = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  GRASS_MIN_AREA_PARAMETER = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  GRASS_OUTPUT_TYPE_PARAMETER = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  GRASS_VECTOR_DSCO = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  GRASS_VECTOR_LCO = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  GRASS_VECTOR_EXPORT_NOCAT = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  ...,
  .complete_output = TRUE
)

Arguments

input

source - Input layer. Path to a vector layer.
type

enum of ("line", "boundary", "area") - Input feature type. Number of selected option, e.g. '1'. Comma separated list of options, e.g. '1,3'.
cats

string - Category values. String value.
where

string - WHERE conditions of SQL statement without 'where' keyword. String value.
method

enum of ("douglas", "douglas_reduction", "lang", "reduction", "reumann", "boyle", "sliding_averaging", "distance_weighting", "chaiken", "hermite", "snakes", "network", "displacement") - Generalization algorithm. Number of selected option, e.g. '1'. Comma separated list of options, e.g. '1,3'.
threshold

number - Maximal tolerance value. A numeric value.
look_ahead

number - Look-ahead parameter. A numeric value.
reduction

number - Percentage of the points in the output of 'douglas_reduction' algorithm. A numeric value.
slide

number - Slide of computed point toward the original point. A numeric value.
angle_thresh

number - Minimum angle between two consecutive segments in Hermite method. A numeric value.
degree_thresh

number - Degree threshold in network generalization. A numeric value.
closeness_thresh

number - Closeness threshold in network generalization. A numeric value.
betweeness_thresh

number - Betweenness threshold in network generalization. A numeric value.
alpha

number - Snakes alpha parameter. A numeric value.
beta

number - Snakes beta parameter. A numeric value.
iterations

number - Number of iterations. A numeric value.
.t

boolean - Do not copy attributes. 1 for true/yes. 0 for false/no. Original algorithm parameter name: name.
.l

boolean - Disable loop support. 1 for true/yes. 0 for false/no. Original algorithm parameter name: name.
output

vectorDestination - Generalized. Path for new vector layer.
error

vectorDestination - Errors. Path for new vector layer.
GRASS_REGION_PARAMETER

extent - GRASS GIS 7 region extent. A comma delimited string of x min, x max, y min, y max. E.g. '4,10,101,105'. Path to a layer. The extent of the layer is used..
GRASS_SNAP_TOLERANCE_PARAMETER

number - v.in.ogr snap tolerance (-1 = no snap). A numeric value.
GRASS_MIN_AREA_PARAMETER

number - v.in.ogr min area. A numeric value.
GRASS_OUTPUT_TYPE_PARAMETER

enum of ("auto", "point", "line", "area") - v.out.ogr output type. Number of selected option, e.g. '1'. Comma separated list of options, e.g. '1,3'.
GRASS_VECTOR_DSCO

string - v.out.ogr output data source options (dsco). String value.
GRASS_VECTOR_LCO

string - v.out.ogr output layer options (lco). String value.
GRASS_VECTOR_EXPORT_NOCAT

boolean - Also export features without category (not labeled). Otherwise only features with category are exported. 1 for true/yes. 0 for false/no.
...

further parameters passed to qgisprocess::qgis_run_algorithm()
.complete_output

logical specifing if complete out of qgisprocess::qgis_run_algorithm() should be used (TRUE) or first output (most likely the main) should read (FALSE). Default value is TRUE.

Details

Outputs description

  • output - outputVector - Generalized

  • error - outputVector - Errors

Contents
